description: We are changing the title to increase clicks on the homepage banner
name: EXP-1: Title Change

description: We have spotted an opportunity to increase enquiries for specific service lines and industries using our Insights. By adding a contact form pop up on Insights (once a user has scrolled 50% of the page), we will increase enquiries for specific service lines/industries, because we have found that users don’t visit service pages to find key contacts
name: AU01T45SubscribePopup

description: By adding a sticky, but closable contact banner to the top of the page that stays where it is as a mobile user scrolls, we will increase traffic to our contact us and meet our people pages, because we have found that mobile users as less likely to travel to and engage with these important pages.
name: AU02AllStickyContactBanner

attributes.html: Ready to take the next steps? Listen now
Not sure what you're looking for? Listen now

description: This is a custom menu version for Australia firm
name: AU03NavigationBar

changes.value:
window.isNav31=!0,document.addEventListener("DOMContentLoaded",function(){let e={_4c656164657273686970207465616d:"Meet Grant Thornton Australia's Board and leadership team",_4e6577732063656e747265:"Read the latest news and announcements from Grant Thornton Australia here.",_416c756d6e69:"Be a part of something great – join Grant Thornton’s Alumni program",_546563686e6f6c6f67792c204d6564696120262054656c65636f6d6d756e69636174696f6e73:"Technology, media and telecommunications is at the centre of modern life. Acting as disruptors and enablers across all industries, with a fast pace of change and complexity, anything from new technologies to start-ups has the potential to go global from day one.",_52657461696c202620436f6e73756d65722050726f6475637473:"Retail is in our DNA. Retailers need to continually adapt their operating model to stay in business and grow, and our aim is to help you find a better, simpler, more efficient and more profitable way of doing things.",_5265616c20457374617465202620436f6e737472756374696f6e:"Real estate and construction has always been a stalwart for the Australian economy. In good times, cranes dot our city skylines. When times are tough, both State and Federal Government invest in infrastructure to create jobs to increase value.",_50726f66657373696f6e616c205365727669636573:"Professional services is one of the fastest growing sectors in the economy. Focused on helping businesses anticipate and manage change in today’s fast-paced world, and setting Australia’s knowledge powerhouse up for success.",_4e6f7420666f722050726f666974:"One of the challenges for social impact organisations is to deliver their purpose in an increasingly dynamic and data-driven space. Stakeholders, including Boards, members, funders, governments or investors, are craving for outcomes-based decision-making. We support social impact entities to deliver for communities.",_4d616e75666163747572696e67:"The innovators, the masters of the bespoke, the IP generators, and the job creators will be the winners in small and medium sized manufacturing. Our experts can help you leverage the opportunities ahead.",_4c69666520536369656e636573:"The life sciences sector in Australia has always been a strong one – with state-of-the-art research facilities and capabilities, we’ve punched above our weight on the global stage.",_4865616c7468202620416765642043617265:"The latest Intergenerational Report highlights that Australia’s future population will be smaller and older than predicted pre-COVID, with aged care spending likely to nearly double as a share of the economy, from 1.2% of GDP in 2021 to 2.1% by 2060-61.",_46696e616e6369616c205365727669636573:"Financial services institutions operate in dynamic and innovative environments, organisations need to embrace opportunity and be agile to regulatory and operational change to stay ahead.",_456e657267792026205265736f7572636573:"From an active natural resources M&A market, a growing energy and renewable energy market, to new technologies and export and trade agreements – we have the expertise to help energy & resources companies at any stage of the life cycle.",_41677269627573696e6573732c20466f6f642026204265766572616765:"Our experts work with some of the nation’s most innovative and exciting brands from the agribusiness, food & beverage industry to take advantage of opportunities and respond to change.",_43757272656e74206f70706f7274756e6974696573:"At Grant Thornton we do things differently because we understand that when you strive for better and care about what you do remarkable things are possible. We’re a dynamic and authentic mix of backgrounds, perspectives and ways of thinking. We’re driven by our shared purpose – we care for our people, clients and communities and support them to thrive."};setTimeout(()=>{GT.isDesktopView()&&"undefined"!=typeof isNav3&&document.querySelectorAll(".bleed").forEach(function(t){let a=t.querySelectorAll(".mega-link--level-2");function n(e){let t=e.target.closest(".mega-link--level-2"),n=t.dataset.idx;a.forEach(function(e){e.classList.contains("mega__level--2-group")&&(e.classList.remove("active"),e.setAttribute("expanded","true"))}),a[n].classList.add("active"),a[n].nextElementSibling.scrollIntoViewIfNeeded({behavior:"smooth",block:"center",inline:"center"})}a.forEach(function(t,a){if(!t.classList.contains("mega__level--2-group")){let n=t.target;t.classList.add("hide-desktop"),t.closest(".mega__level--2").insertAdjacentHTML("beforeend",`
${t.textContent}
  • ${n?t.innerHTML:t.textContent}

${e["_"+GT.generateHexCode(t.textContent.trim())]||""}

`)}}),a=t.querySelectorAll(".mega-link--level-2"),document.querySelectorAll(".mega-link--level-2-placeholder .mega-link, a.first-level").forEach(e=>{e.modified||e.target||(e.innerHTML=`${e.textContent}`,e.classList.add("btn-secondary"),e.insertAdjacentHTML("beforeend",''))}),a.forEach(function(e,t){0==t&&e.classList.contains("mega__level--2-group")&&(e.classList.add("active"),e.setAttribute("expanded","true")),e.dataset.idx=t,e.addEventListener("click",n)})}),document.querySelectorAll(".global-search__toggle, .mobile-search-toggle").forEach(e=>{e.addEventListener("click",e=>{"true"===e.target.getAttribute("aria-expanded")&&(window.optimizely=window.optimizely||[],window.optimizely.push({type:"event",eventName:"search_interaction"}))})})},1e3)});

@media (min-width:1024px){.nav3{--au-menu-lv2-width:268px}.nav3 .btn-secondary:hover .button-vi-text{text-decoration:underline;text-underline-offset:.18em}.nav3 .first-level,.nav3 .mega-link,.nav3 .mega-link>span,.nav3 .mega__level--2-group{width:var(--au-menu-lv2-width)}.nav3 .mega__level--3__listing .mega-link{width:auto;--button-vi-text-color:#4f2d7f}.nav3 .mega-link--level-2-placeholder .button-vi-text,.nav3 .mega-link--level-2-placeholder a.mega-link{font-weight:300}.nav3 .group-title .external-link-icon,.nav3 .mega-link--level-2-placeholder .external-link-icon{width:2rem;height:2rem}.nav3 .bleed-row:has(.mega__level--2-group) .active{background:#f2f0ee;border-radius:.4rem}.nav3 .bleed-row:has(.mega__level--2-group)::after{content:"";width:1px;height:91%;background:#f2f0ee;position:absolute;bottom:0;left:calc(var(--au-menu-lv2-width) + 6.4rem)}.nav3 ul.stacked-bleed:has(.mega__level--2-group)::after{height:100%}.nav3 .mega-link--level-2+.mega__level--3__listing{max-height:0;opacity:0;visibility:hidden;position:absolute;margin:0;top:0;left:calc(var(--au-menu-lv2-width) + 80px);transition:opacity .2s}.nav3 .mega-link--level-2+div.mega__level--3__listing{margin-top:6px}.nav3 .bleed-row:not(.stacked-bleed):has(.mega__level--2-group) .mega-link--level-2+.mega__level--3__listing{top:7.8rem}.nav3 .mega__level--3__listing p{font-size:1.4rem;max-width:768px;padding-left:16px}.nav3 .bleed-row .active+.mega__level--3__listing{max-height:9999px;opacity:1;visibility:visible;scroll-margin-top:20rem}.nav3 ul.stacked-bleed{display:flex;flex-direction:column;gap:.4rem;column-count:1;column-gap:0}.nav3 .bleed-row{flex-direction:column;position:relative}.nav3 .bleed-column{width:100%}.nav3 .header-container .translate-y-with-opacity.trigger-animation .translate-animation-item{transform:none}.nav3 .header-container .translate-y-with-opacity .translate-animation-item{transition:opacity .3s cubic-bezier(.4, 0, .2, 1)}.nav3 .bleed:has(.mega__level--2-group) .mega-link--level-2,.nav3 .bleed:has(.mega__level--2-group) .mega-link--level-2 .mega-link{font-weight:300;color:#2b144d;cursor:auto}.nav3 .bleed .mega-link--level-2{padding-top:1.6rem}.nav3 .bleed svg.svg-animation-vi{min-width:2.4rem;width:2.4rem}.nav3 .bleed:has(.group-title):has(.mega__level--2-group) .mega-link--level-2{padding:.8rem 3.2rem .8rem 1.6rem;box-sizing:content-box}.nav3 .bleed-row .mega__level--2{padding-top:0}.nav3 .mega__level--2-group{position:relative;cursor:pointer}.nav3 .mega__level--2-group::after{content:"";width:.8rem;height:.8rem;border-right:2px solid #a06dff;border-top:2px solid #a06dff;border-radius:1px;transform:rotate(45deg);position:absolute;right:1.6rem;top:50%;margin-top:-6px}.nav3 .mega__level--2-group.active::after{border-color:#2b144d}.nav3 .second-level+.mega__level--3__listing ul.mega__content--listing{border-left:none;padding-top:0}.nav3 .second-level a:has(.nav3-arrow-icon){pointer-events:none}.nav3 .second-level:hover a:has(.nav3-arrow-icon){color:#ce2c2c}.nav3 .mega-link--level-2-placeholder{display:block}.nav3 .mega-content__item+.mega-content__item,.nav3 .mega-link--level-2-placeholder.mega-content__item+.mega-content__item{margin-top:1.6rem}.nav3 .group-title .first-level,.nav3 .group-title .first-level .button-vi-text{--button-vi-text-color:#4f2d7f;font-weight:200}.nav3 div.group-title .first-level{color:#4f2d7f}.nav3 .bleed:has(.mega__level--2-group) div.group-title+ul{margin-top:2rem}.nav3 .bleed .selected .button-vi-text,.nav3 .bleed:has(.mega__level--2-group) .mega-link.selected{color:#ce2c2c;--button-vi-text-color:#ce2c2c}.nav3 .bleed-area{width:auto}.nav3 .mega-link--level-2.hide-desktop{display:none}}@media (max-width:1023px){.nav3 .first-level{padding:0}.nav3 .btn-secondary .svg-animation-vi,.nav3 .mega-link--level-2.hide-mobile{display:none}.nav3 .btn-secondary .button-vi-text{color:#4f2d7f;transition:none}.nav3 .btn-secondary:hover .button-vi-text{color:#ce2c2c}.nav3 .btn-secondary:hover{text-decoration:underline}}
